title: The World of life: a journal of the outdoors. Issue No. 9
creator_credit: Leon Clore, Grahame Tharp, John Taylor and Countryman Films
brief_description: Magazine film containing the following items - Mr Ramshaw - Captain’s Knight’s 25 year old Golden eagle; World of fire - solar prominences; Signpost at sea - the Longstone Lighthouse on the Farne Islands. From the series “World of Life” issue no 9.
